title: mAnilam vAzhvuravE
sahitya:
mAnilam vAzhvuravE vanda mahAtmA mA perum punitAtmA gAndhi mahAtmA


anupallavi

  bhArata nATTirkkiNai pArinil iNai enrE sIruDan yAvarum ceppiDum nilai tanda


caraNam    shAntam ahimsaiyum sattiya jnAnamum sArndiDavE engum samarasam OngiDavE
pAngam migundiDavE pagarndAr anbu neri padam paNivOm avar shol idam aramum nALum
